data.description: The data to render the chart from. If it is not specified, it must be set on individual series instead.

container.description: The element to place the rendered chart canvas element into.

tooltipOffset.description: Offset of a tooltip from the cursor, specified as [xOffset, yOffset].

tooltipClass.description: A class to be added to tooltips in the chart.

top.description: Padding at the top of the chart area.

right.description: Padding at the right of the chart area.

bottom.description: Padding at the bottom of the chart area.

left.description: Padding at the left of the chart area.

visible.description: Whether the background should be visible or not.

enabled.description: Whether the title should be shown or not.

text.description: The text to show in the title.

color.description: The colour to use for the title.

fontStyle.description: The font style to use for the title.

fontWeight.description: The font weight to use for the title.

fontSize.description: The font size to use for the title.

fontFamily.description: The font family to use for the title.

enabled.description: Whether the subtitle should be shown or not. Note: a subtitle will only be shown if a title is also visible.

text.description: The text to show in the subtitle.

color.description: The colour to use for the subtitle.

fontStyle.description: The font style to use for the subtitle.

fontWeight.description: The font weight to use for the subtitle.

fontSize.description: The font size to use for the subtitle.

fontFamily.description: The font family to use for the subtitle.

enabled.description: Configures whether to show the legend.

position.description: Where the legend should show in relation to the chart.

spacing.description: The spacing to use outside the legend.

layoutHorizontalSpacing.description: The horizontal spacing to use between legend items.

layoutVerticalSpacing.description: The vertical spacing to use between legend items.

itemSpacing.description: The spacing between a legend marker and the corresponding label.

markerShape.description: This will override the marker shape from the series and show the specified marker shape in the legend instead.

markerSize.description: The size of the markers in the legend.

strokeWidth.description: The width of the stroke for markers in the legend.

fontStyle.description: The font style to use for the legend.

fontWeight.description: The font weight to use for the legend.

fontSize.description: The font size to use for the legend.

fontFamily.description: The font family to use for the legend.

meta.description: Configuration used for axes in cartesian charts.

position.description: The position on the chart to render the axis in.

rotation.description: The rotation of the axis in degrees.

enabled.description: Whether the axis title should be shown or not.

text.description: The text to show in the axis title.

color.description: The colour to use for the axis title.

fontStyle.description: The font style to use for the axis title.

fontWeight.description: The font weight to use for the axis title.

fontSize.description: The font size to use for the axis title.

fontFamily.description: The font family to use for the axis title.

width.description: Width of the axis ticks (and corresponding grid line).

count.description: A hint of how many ticks to use across an axis.

fontStyle.description: The font style to use for the labels.

fontWeight.description: The font weight to use for the labels.

fontSize.description: The font size to use for the labels.

fontFamily.description: The font family to use for the labels.

color.description: The colour to use for the labels.

padding.description: Padding between the axis label and the tick.

mirrored.description: By default, labels and ticks are positioned to the left of the axis. Setting this to true will position them on the right instead.

parallel.description: By default, labels are rendered perpendicular to the axis. Setting this to <true> will render them parallel to the line instead.

format.description: Format string used when rendering labels for time axes. For more information on the structure of the string, click here.

formatter.description: Function used to render axis labels. If value is a number, fractionDigits will also be provided, which indicates the number of fractional digits used in the step between ticks; for example, a tick step of 0.0005 would have fractionDigits set to 4.

lineDash.description: Defines how the gridlines are rendered. Every number in the array specifies the length of alternating dashes and gaps. For example, [6, 3] means dash of length 6 and gap of length 3.

xKey.description: The key to use to retrieve x-values from the data.

xName.description: A human-readable description of the x-values.

yKeys.description: The keys to use to retrieve y-values from the data.

data.description: The data to use when rendering the series. If it is not supplied, data must be set on the chart instead.

visible.description: Whether to display the series or not.

showInLegend.description: Whether to include the series in the legend.

tooltipEnabled.description: Whether or not to show tooltips when the series are hovered over.

tooltipRenderer.description: Function used to create the content for tooltips.

grouped.description: Whether to show different y-values as separate bars (grouped) or not (stacked).

normalizedTo.description: The number to normalise the bar stacks to. Has no effect when grouped is true.

flipXY.description: Flips the direction of the bars.

fills.description: Colours to cycle through for the fills of the bars.

fillOpacity.description: The opacity of the fill for the bars.

strokes.description: Colours to cycle through for the strokes of the bars.

strokeOpacity.description: The opacity of the stroke for the bars.

strokeWidth.description: The width of the stroke for the bars.

fill.description: The fill colour of the bars when hovered over.

stroke.description: The colour of the stroke around the bars when hovered over.

enabled.description: Whether the shadow is visible or not.

blur.description: How much to blur the shadow.

xKey.description: The key to use to retrieve x-values from the data.

xName.description: A human-readable description of the x-values.

yKey.description: The key to use to retrieve y-values from the data.

yName.description: A human-readable description of the y-values.

data.description: The data to use when rendering the series. If it is not supplied, data must be set on the chart instead.

visible.description: Whether to display the series or not.

showInLegend.description: Whether to include the series in the legend.

tooltipEnabled.description: Whether or not to show tooltips when the series are hovered over.

tooltipRenderer.description: Function used to create the content for tooltips.

title.description: The title to use for the series. Defaults to yName if it exists, or yKey if not.

stroke.description: The colour of the stroke for the lines.

strokeOpacity.description: The opacity of the stroke for the lines.

strokeWidth.description: The width of the stroke for the lines.

fill.description: The fill colour of the markers when hovered over.

stroke.description: The colour of the stroke around the markers when hovered over.

enabled.description: Whether to show markers or not.

shape.description: The shape to use for the markers. You can also supply a custom marker by extending the Marker class and providing that.

minSize.description: For series where the size of the marker is determined by the data, this determines the smallest size a marker can be.

fill.description: The colour to use for marker fills. If this is not specified, the markers will take their fill from the series.

stroke.description: The colour to use for marker strokes. If this is not specified, the markers will take their stroke from the series.

strokeWidth.description: The width of the marker stroke. If this is not specified, the markers will take their stroke width from the series.

formatter.description: Function used to return formatting for individual markers, based on the supplied information.

xKey.description: The key to use to retrieve x-values from the data.

xName.description: A human-readable description of the x-values.

yKeys.description: The keys to use to retrieve y-values from the data.

data.description: The data to use when rendering the series. If it is not supplied, data must be set on the chart instead.

visible.description: Whether to display the series or not.

showInLegend.description: Whether to include the series in the legend.

tooltipEnabled.description: Whether or not to show tooltips when the series are hovered over.

tooltipRenderer.description: Function used to create the content for tooltips.

normalizedTo.description: The number to normalise the areas stack to.

fills.description: Colours to cycle through for the fills of the areas.

fillOpacity.description: The opacity of the fill for the areas.

strokes.description: Colours to cycle through for the strokes of the areas.

strokeOpacity.description: The opacity of the stroke for the areas.

strokeWidth.description: The width of the stroke for the areas.

fill.description: The fill colour of the markers when hovered over.

stroke.description: The colour of the stroke around the markers when hovered over.

enabled.description: Whether to show markers or not.

shape.description: The shape to use for the markers. You can also supply a custom marker by extending the Marker class and providing that.

minSize.description: For series where the size of the marker is determined by the data, this determines the smallest size a marker can be.

fill.description: The colour to use for marker fills. If this is not specified, the markers will take their fill from the series.

stroke.description: The colour to use for marker strokes. If this is not specified, the markers will take their stroke from the series.

strokeWidth.description: The width of the marker stroke. If this is not specified, the markers will take their stroke width from the series.

formatter.description: Function used to return formatting for individual markers, based on the supplied information.

enabled.description: Whether the shadow is visible or not.

blur.description: How much to blur the shadow.

xKey.description: The key to use to retrieve x-values from the data.

xName.description: A human-readable description of the x-values.

yKey.description: The key to use to retrieve y-values from the data.

yName.description: A human-readable description of the y-values.

sizeKey.description: The key to use to retrieve size values from the data, used to control the size of the markers in bubble charts.

sizeName.description: A human-readable description of the size values.

labelKey.description: The key to use to retrieve values from the data to use as labels for the markers.

labelName.description: A human-readable description of the label values.

data.description: The data to use when rendering the series. If it is not supplied, data must be set on the chart instead.

visible.description: Whether to display the series or not.

showInLegend.description: Whether to include the series in the legend.

tooltipEnabled.description: Whether or not to show tooltips when the series are hovered over.

tooltipRenderer.description: Function used to create the content for tooltips.

title.description: The title to use for the series. Defaults to yName if it exists, or yKey if not.

fill.description: The colour of the fill for the markers.

fillOpacity.description: The opacity of the fill for the markers.

stroke.description: The colour of the stroke for the markers.

strokeOpacity.description: The opacity of the stroke for the markers.

strokeWidth.description: The width of the stroke for the markers.

fill.description: The fill colour of the markers when hovered over.

stroke.description: The colour of the stroke around the markers when hovered over.

enabled.description: Whether to show markers or not.

shape.description: The shape to use for the markers. You can also supply a custom marker by extending the Marker class and providing that.

minSize.description: For series where the size of the marker is determined by the data, this determines the smallest size a marker can be.

fill.description: The colour to use for marker fills. If this is not specified, the markers will take their fill from the series.

stroke.description: The colour to use for marker strokes. If this is not specified, the markers will take their stroke from the series.

strokeWidth.description: The width of the marker stroke. If this is not specified, the markers will take their stroke width from the series.

formatter.description: Function used to return formatting for individual markers, based on the supplied information.

angleKey.description: The key to use to retrieve angle values from the data.

angleName.description: A human-readable description of the angle values.

labelKey.description: The key to use to retrieve label values from the data.

labelName.description: A human-readable description of the label values.

radiusKey.description: The key to use to retrieve radius values from the data.

radiusName.description: A human-readable description of the radius values.

data.description: The data to use when rendering the series. If it is not supplied, data must be set on the chart instead.

visible.description: Whether to display the series or not.

showInLegend.description: Whether to include the series in the legend.

tooltipEnabled.description: Whether or not to show tooltips when the series are hovered over.

tooltipRenderer.description: Function used to create the content for tooltips.

rotation.description: The rotation of the pie series.

innerRadiusOffset.description: The offset of the inner radius of the series. Used to construct doughnut charts.

outerRadiusOffset.description: The offset of the outer radius of the series. Used to construct doughnut charts.

enabled.description: Whether the title should be shown or not.

text.description: The text to show in the title.

color.description: The colour to use for the title.

fontStyle.description: The font style to use for the title.

fontWeight.description: The font weight to use for the title.

fontSize.description: The font size to use for the title.

fontFamily.description: The font family to use for the title.

fills.description: Colours to cycle through for the fills of the segments.

fillOpacity.description: The opacity of the fill for the segments.

strokes.description: Colours to cycle through for the strokes of the segments.

strokeOpacity.description: The opacity of the stroke for the segments.

strokeWidth.description: The width of the stroke for the segments.

fill.description: The fill colour of the segments when hovered over.

stroke.description: The colour of the stroke around the segments when hovered over.

enabled.description: Whether the labels should be shown or not.

color.description: The colour to use for the labels.

fontStyle.description: The font style to use for the labels.

fontWeight.description: The font weight to use for the labels.

fontSize.description: The font size to use for the labels.

fontFamily.description: The font family to use for the labels.

offset.description: Distance between the callout line and the label text.

minAngle.description: Minimum angle required for a segment to show a label.

colors.description: Colours to cycle through for the strokes of the callouts.

strokeWidth.description: Width of the stroke for callout lines.

length.description: The length of the callout lines.

enabled.description: Whether the shadow is visible or not.

blur.description: How much to blur the shadow.
